success_criteria: Deterministic canonicalization and hashing utilities are implemented.
Memory gating enforces policy evaluator decisions.
Maestro memory lookup returns gated bundles with telemetry.
Unit tests cover canonicalization, hashing determinism, collision behavior, and policy filtering.
stop_conditions: Policy evaluation cannot be expressed as policy-as-code inputs.
Determinism is compromised by non-deterministic dependencies.
Changes would cross primary zone boundaries without explicit coupling rationale.
